entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Arviat
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Near blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Near blizzard developing in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
